dimension: 1128 x 1128 in. (2865.13 x 2865.13 cm) (overall with border)
title: Labyrinth
description: 2 ft. squares of granite on surface of plaza; sierra white- and academy black granite; white granite columns in pavillion; black steel roof of pavillion with maze cut into it; fluorescent light tubes in cutout areas on inside of middle column of each side
creditline: Gift of funds from US West and the Gerald Rauenhorst Family Foundation
